channel.title: Altirra update feed (release channel)
channel.description: Automatic update notifications for release versions of the Altirra emulator.

ul.li: Cartridges: CAR types 71-75, XE Multicard, SIC+ added.
Cassette: PWM encoded turbo data in CAS files, Turbo Blizzard support, improved C: acceleration, and fixes to the Tape Editor.
Debugger: New breakpoint window, editable memory window, and improved source debugging support.
Disk: Improved accuracy and support for track buffering in standard disk emulator.
Display: Reduced latency, improved HDR display support, and vsync adaptive mode.
Emulation: Improved accuracy of POKEY timer and serial port emulation.
UI: Improved dark mode and copy/paste.
